name: Sacrificial Legacy: The Cost of Cosmic Capitalism
name_original: Sacrificial Legacy: The Cost of Cosmic Capitalism
description:
After a spacecraft sustains serious damage and crash lands on an unknown planet, only one thing is certain. Some people are going to die. The captain makes an order to start mining the planet for its valuable resources so that the ship can be repaired and you can escape.

There’s only one problem. Spacesuits only have a limited amount of Oxygen, which means that for some crew members, death is inevitable.

Sacrificial Legacy: The Cost of Cosmic Capitalism is a relaxing mining game where death is simply just the start of a new life.

Controls

WASD to move

Mouse to Aim

Left Mouse Button to fire laser

Right Mouse button to use grappling Hook

Left Shift to cooldown laser faster

Spacebar to Dash

If playing the Web build, try making it full screen to avoid any UI scaling issues.

Made in a week by Adam Womersley, Sam Barnsby and Joel Mann for the Brackeys 2023.1 Game Jam with the theme: An end is a new beginning.
